Text:
Skip with 2 duplicates reshows the first one (because the first one is removed from the list, placed at the end and the index is increased...
We should not increase the index in that case. Or just not move it to the end...)
Add continuation? Setting a minimum duration? maximum duration?
Add timer to show for how long we are dedupping
make delete button set dialog result manually (so in case of exception, it won't close)
Make delete button cancel thubnail loading
move compare dlg buttons to the outside instead of the inside
Don't load all thumbnails beforehand. Load them on demand. So that 2 completely different thumbnails will avoid loading the others.
Cache can contain more files than actually exist
Load thumbnails in comparison dialog lazy
Resolve conflicts while searching for deduplications
